website_summaries.verdict: Faucet has a vintage look with X-style handles and a faucet that extends far from the wall.
pros: Spout swivels to make the faucet more convenient to use
Will give you a very nice antique look throughout the design of the faucet
Will work as a kitchen faucet or a bathroom faucet
X-style handles contain porcelain coated levers that indicate the hot and cold side for a vintage look
cons: Faucet extends quite a ways from wall, so it may not fit your sink

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet, too deep for bathroom sinks
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty faucet. Feels sturdy, not made of plastic. I think the intended use is more for a laundry room application. We ordered these for our bathroom and I didn't realize how far they would stick out, the faucet came well past the middle of the sink. Panic set in, until we realized we could remove the knuckles and reduce the depth with a special plumbing coupling piece. So now they come to the center of our sink. Overall they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Bjerk

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory product. Dishonest warranty
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that after six months the faucet began to leak where the spout is attached. My plumber says that a couple of small parts need to be replaced. However, Kingston Brass refuses to honour its manufacturer's warranty outside of the U.S. although the warranty doesn't say anything about that. (I'm in Canada.)
customer_reviews.author: Amelia G.

customer_reviews.title: Cool vintage look!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vintage look! Doing a full bathroom remodel, needed a faucet that had the right look for our new hammered copper tub as I was planning on installing it to the wall. Easy install and great look!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice looking fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking fixture. It's classic design spiffs up any sink. Nice retro look. That being said within three months both the hot and cold water label buttons fell off within the first six months of use. I simply glued them back on, but still, that really shouldn't happen in such little time and use.
customer_reviews.author: michael dana wells

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but does not contain all parts
customer_reviews.text: This faucet looks great in my basement bathroom/laundry. It is installed on a Kohler utility sink, so the installation was not straightforward (I don't think it would be a DIY job). The only issue with this purchase was that the faucet did not come with a wall mounting kit, and my contractor needed to go to a plumbing supply store to get a few more parts. I think it was worth it because any comparable wall mounted faucet cost 2 or 3x what this faucet did. I cannot speak to durability since we just put it in, but I don't expect this faucet to get a lot of heavy use in the extra bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Geary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Faucet
customer_reviews.text: If you need a wall mount faucet for the kitchen or utility sinks, it would be difficult to do better than this product. It is solid and substantial--appears to be all brass, except the trim rings. It adjusts nicely to a variety of spread widths. I would buy this again, especially at this price point. No need for a Kohler at four times the cost.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I guess the old addage, "You get what you pay for", applies to this product. Faucet looks great but the cold water cartridge failed after only 2 months of use. I purchased a warranty for this item but never received any paperwork for it. Sent an email message to the Customer Support area of the manufacturer but have heard nothing as yet. Tried to locate required parts to repair at local plumbing supply dealers to no avail. I'll give the manufacturer another week to respond. If they don't, I guess have no option but to buy someone else's product.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily, looks great but it seeps. There are no valves to seat, no rings to replace and it just allows a few drops to leak over the day. Having a huge party and don’t have time to send it back and replace as it’s in the sink we’ll use for ice/wine...
customer_reviews.author: MoodyCat

customer_reviews.title: Brown water for a week now!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, had it for a week now, however when you don't use the faucet for a few hours it discharges a brownish water. Glad I'm not using it to drink out of (installed in a powder room) Antique brass color
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous faucet!! I give it a two thumbs up and highly recommend this. Quality is great, craftsmanship is excellent. Just make sure you can actually fit this faucet in your sink, it does come off the wall a good distance. If not the company has a lot of great stuff online .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised with the quality of this when it showed up. I fully expected it to be cheap and look cheap while just barely doing the job...but I was wrong. It’s cute and it’s got a decent amount adjustable movement ability.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Kephart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but leaky
customer_reviews.text: I tried two faucet assemblies but was unable to set up either without leaking. I had to return the item twice, receiving full credit and quickly receiving replacement faucet. In the end, I paid about $200 for a faucet at a plumbing store to get the job done properly.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t installed this faucet yet, but I’m blown away by the quality of the finish. It’s very heavy...doesn’t feel cheap. No, of course it wasn’t cheap either, but considering I was able to get the look I wanted at half the price of more expensive fixtures, I’d say it’s a bargain. I’m hopeful installation will be easy. Can’t wait to see how it’ll look in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: ColePL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for antique sink
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect faucet for the antique sink I carted out of the woods! Sturdy metal, expanded to the perfect width and has great water flow. No more using the kitchen sink for dirty kid hands🥰
customer_reviews.author: Monica Sartin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a double vanity and have had them for several years. Both have had issues. One of them the hot side valve busted so it didn’t stop. You can turn it past stop and it would flow, so you have to position it just so to keep the water from running. The hot and cold markers have fallen off of all 4 handles. The handles routinely need to be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality faucet
customer_reviews.text: High quality faucet that works well and easy to install. I am using it in garage so didn’t want an expensive faucet but this quite good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Not as heavy as Newport Brass but it's 100 percent better quality than anything you'll find a a big box store. The Amazon price is considerably less than the Signature Hardware site.
customer_reviews.author: former hokie

customer_reviews.title: quality is there.  a well mfg prod.
customer_reviews.text: great value, made medium duty the old good way, real chrome plated brass of ave- medium mass. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing faucet. So cute and gives the farmhouse look! They look great installed and the kids can definelty reach the handles!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bathtub Filler for me
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this faucet to fill a bathtub from the wall...prefect!! I am very pleased with the quality, very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This faucet replaced my vintage one that broke. I'm really pleased with the quality. Very solid and nice looking. Price is right also.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Great high-quality heavy duty good looking product. Kingston does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Great high-quality heavy duty good looking product. Kingston does not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: cory a leinweber

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made, works well, and it’s attractive. Off to full on is 1/4 turn which is a nice feature. I’ve had three people look at it and want to know where they could get one!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful faucet to add vintage charm!
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect faucet for the vision that I had in my daughters' bathroom... We installed it with no issues onto a repurposed dry sink. I could not be happier- 10/10 would buy again and again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet, sturdy, high quality and easy to install! It looks great in my laundry room. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesnowta Man

customer_reviews.title: Value until the faucets drip.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two versions kept both since hot cold ceramic cartridges will eventually drip and are not cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK JAY

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gave my kitchen a new look! Love the color would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Myia Awusah-Duke

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a plumber, and couldn't get this to stop leaking. Couldn't return put up way after i ordered. Also, our hot handle sticks out more than the cold..... drives me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed. 5 months in and it's leaking from the spout seal. Would never, ever buy again. Save your money!!!! Not only will I have to buy a new one, but I'll have to pay a plummer again. Extremely unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & looks high end
customer_reviews.text: Our 2nd faucet from this company & it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Dont know much about this. Looked so nice. It was installed in a dog grooming salon.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Appreciated it was adjustable since it was mounted ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Appreciated it was adjustable since it was mounted on a very old sink that didn’t have standard mounting holes. And the decent pricing was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: The description says this faucet is solid brass ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: The description says this faucet is solid brass. That may be true, however the spout itself is plastic. False advertising to say the least. If this matters to you... find another faucet.
customer_reviews.author: P. F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, very high end
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality, very high end. It did exactly what we needed. We used it on an old 5' cast iron sink and gave it new life. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Desposito

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and is high quality! The faucet swivels which is nice while cleaning. It’s fairly large so be aware if you’re buying it for a sink. Definitely fits well though!
customer_reviews.author: CSP R09

customer_reviews.title: Even more stunning in person!
customer_reviews.text: Even more beautiful in person. Just what I was looking for. Stylish, seems sturdy. Spout swings side to side to accommodate smaller sink basin.
customer_reviews.author: rlo

customer_reviews.title: I love how it looks but the plumber was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks but the plumber was skeptical. He ended up having to purchase s special wrench to keep it from leaking. Don’t think I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: evan and alissa gallegos

customer_reviews.title: historic home bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: This bathroom is my guest bathroom in my historic home. I wanted to have a wall mounted faucet. I love how this bathroom turned out
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: The faucet fits my old farmhouse kitchen sink which was installed when the house was built in 1929. The Plummer who installed it said it was very simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Esposito

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 15 months ago. spout leaks at the base.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick d

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, they are gorgeous. Can't wait to get them installed in my bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Look
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for my remodeled bathroom where I used a vintage cabinet and square, above counter sink.
customer_reviews.author: D. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want amazon or manufacturer to provide support in future.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet drips from cold water side. Try contacting amazon support, they send me to manufacturer. Try contacting manufacturer, they ignore me... To date not worth the cheaper price, will update here if either amazon or manufacturer decide to help me out. Ohh and this thing dripped from the first use after install....
customer_reviews.author: Nick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Price is good but very light weight . Hope it will last for everyday use .
customer_reviews.author: Deb h.

customer_reviews.title: No exchange if you have issues
customer_reviews.text: The flow is not fast enough by the time it fills up the tub is cold. Took forever to get it to stop leaking. Tried to return or exchange but it has a super short window for issues
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great purchase. The materials at top of the line ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have cost 400 dollars at any retail outlet. This is a great purchase. The materials at top of the line well put together- very pleased. Arrived on time packaged well would order again.
customer_reviews.author: CMartin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself. It is the highest quality faucet I've ever had and I absolutely love it. It's smooth as silk and a pleasure to own.
customer_reviews.author: G.Glee

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and the quality is excellent! Very well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin I Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just what I needed for my wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just what I needed for my wall mount, vintage kitchen sink set-up
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product easy to install and looked very retro also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The faucet I received leaked badly due to poor casting of the valves. Check before using!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Not threaded right
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work on older copper pipes - not threaded right
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. It's easy to install (with the TS Brass B-0230-K installation kit for B-0230 style faucets - also purchased on Amazon), functions perfectly and looks beautiful. The water flow is much stronger than I expected. I installed it on a stainless steel utility sink. I did not use the two round back cover plates. They weren't needed and it'll be easier to clean around those spots without them. I chose this faucet (with the front facing handles) also with keeping the faucet clean in mind. My wet, or soapy, hands won't drip down onto the rest of the faucet each time I turn it on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect faucet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a vessel sink (from Amazon too) and I bought this faucet to go with it. We were remodeling our master bath and I chose oil rubbed bronze finish for all my fixtures! It is a very solid faucet! Very elegant and classic! You have to be careful installing it because you will scratch the finish. Other than that it is PERFECT!!! Super fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this faucet. Great value. Very well constructed, heavy. Pretty. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: CEO Coach/Chair

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, heavy faucet. Looks great in my laundry sink.
customer_reviews.author: sheffiej

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellect faucet. It fits better than any other faucet I have gotten for my deep sink in the garage. The handles turn off at a snap without forcing them.
customer_reviews.author: I. Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wast your money
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of installation and use this faucet started leaking from the steams and spout area. Could not fine repair parts had to buy a new faucet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just what my grandma was looking for and was easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Faucet neck a little low for my taste, was able to use previous one from faucet I was replacing. Great deal for the money !

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very well made faucet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very well made faucet! I was happily surprised at the quality, given the price! Handles turn very smoothly. I bought a new faucet for my kitchen a couple of years ago that was more tham twice the price, and it isn't even close to the quality of this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent faucet. I've used it for several months now with no problems and it still looks new.

customer_reviews.title: Love

customer_reviews.title: it's an excellent product that you don't see much this dates

customer_reviews.title: Got what I wanted in an easy way.  Easy to order.  Came the next day.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wall faucet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works as intended. The reach from the wall is pretty deep, so measure carefully if you don't have a long sink set up. I have this set up on a laundry sink, so it limits how big of a bucket I can put into the sink. Not really a big deal, but just take note of the dimensions.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our utility sink!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet works great on our mud room utility sink! Functional and also has a classy, vintage feel. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but only lasted 1.5 years before it started to leak and couldn't get the parts to fix it. Ended up replacing it with a different manufacturer.

customer_reviews.title: Quality at Bargain Price

customer_reviews.title: Looks great

I was nervous about the color, but it looks so great in person...I actually purchased this faucet & the oil rubbed bronze version but vastly preferred this one (the oil rubbed bronze has a faux sparkly finish). However, it's not yet been installed so I can't speak to ease of installation or quality.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!

And yes we even used a towel around it to protect is but still got scratched. over all though its a great faucet!

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but doesn't mount directly to a sinks backsplash
customer_reviews.text: I have to give it a 4 star only because it doesn't come with a means to attach solidly to a sink, like a faucet should with nuts that spin up tight. This doesn't have a way to do that. I had to mount copper solidly inside the wall with nipples protruding through at the right distance for the wash tub. Not awful but a lot of extra work because everyone including me uses PEX now, not copper, and PEX doesn't mount solidly without extra work. Anyway the faucet is very high quality, obviously brass underneath. Great price for the quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: On time, just what I expected. Works well. Easy to install

customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The chrome finish is high quality. Looks great.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (for someone familiar with using tools) and it works great! Thanks!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a very old faucet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for a very old faucet. Easy to install, and although I've only had it a few days, it appears to be of excellent quality.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and has held up over 5 yes so far

customer_reviews.text: I used this in the bathroom not the kitchen but it was perfect for what I wanted and I love that I can move the faucet head out of the way when I'm shaving :)

customer_reviews.text: The product looks like a very expensive faucet . The problem with the faucet is in an old vintage sink application , the faucet comes away from the wall quite far and I will have to be cautious when using it to make sure the water stays in the sink .
customer_reviews.author: ME

product_meta.title: Kingston Brass KS213C Victorian Wall Mount Kitchen Faucet, 7", Polished Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:Polished ChromeThis double handle wall mount kitchen faucet is timeless and offers a look that attracts those who appreciate traditional and contemporary designs. The faucet is constructed in solid brass for durability and long-lasting usage. The finish is made of polished chrome for corrosion and tarnishing resistance with the handles acting as a 1/4-turn on/off water control mechanism for water volume and temperature. The faucet operates with a ceramic disc valve for drip-free functionality with a water measured 2.2 GPM (8.3 LPM) and a 60 PSI maximum rate. An integrated removable aerator is fitted beneath the spout's head piece for conserving water flow. A 10-year limited warranty is provided to the original customer.
feature_bullets: 11" Spout Reach from the Wall; 3-5/8" - 8-1/2" Adjustable Spread
Max 1.8 GPM/6.8 LPM Water Flow Rate At 60 PSI (ASME standard)
Compliant with California Energy Commission Title 20

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars284 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
